subject: Web3
title: Decentralized Login
description: A short lesson to help you apply Decentralized Login.

hook.text: 'Sign in with Google' gives Google access to your activity. 'Sign in with Ethereum' gives that control to you.

buildup.text: Blockchain-based login uses your wallet as your identity. No email, no password, no third-party tracking.

discovery.text: Your wallet address becomes your universal username across any platform that supports it.

twist.text: If your wallet is compromised, every account linked to it is at risk. One key replaces many passwords.

climax.text: Decentralized login eliminates passwords but introduces key management challenges. The tradeoff isn't free.

punchline.text: No passwords. No tracking. Just your wallet and your keys.

quiz.question: What is a risk of using a crypto wallet as a universal login?
options: Compromising the wallet exposes all linked accounts
It only works on one device
